channel.title: Wilderness Teleporting...Help! :(
channel.description:
Ok,well i love my server,because its pking is like real runescape (Good memorys) only 1 problem,people can just teleport out of wild during battle,i know thats what teleblock is for,BUT i'm lazy and don't feel like teleblocking,i was wondering if anyone knew how to make it where people can't teleport in wild even if there not teleblocked,any help would be greatly appericated,please post a code on how to do it,if your going to tell me how.
Thanks
~Cody
